item.title: The Data Science Industry: Who Does What
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description:
Great infographic from DataCamp that lays out the roles and skills associated with a data science team. As a data engineer within this group, these are the kind of people I work with day-to-day.

*Source: DataCamp
